DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate additional cholesterol lowering effects in patients with coronary heart disease by giving an investigational drug with a patient's current approved cholesterol lowering medication.
DOC.brief_title: An Investigational Drug Study in Patients With Elevated Cholesterol and Coronary Heart Disease (0653-804)(COMPLETED)
DOC.detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 10 weeks.
DOC.criteria: Patients with elevated cholesterol and coronary heart disease Patients whose cholesterol levels measure within acceptable ranges as specified by the study requirements
